alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:29PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JACKSON...CENTRAL WALTON...HOLMES AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CST... At 428 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Geneva to 8 miles north of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 40 mph. At 424PM CST, the Walton County High School weatherstem gusted to 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville, Noma, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Rock Hill, and Holmes Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
